name: Argon Emulation
description:
Set in 2082, you play as Detective Thalli, an investigator looking into the murder of a security guard and disappearance of Felicia Donovan, a secretary to Veronica Watts of the well-known Haldane Corporation.  The events of the night are recreated in a simulation, in which Thalli acts as Felicia in order to unravel strange loose ends.

How to play:

1. download the .zip file

2. extract the contents 

3. double click on the .exe
